intro.p3: Website loading speed directly affects SEO ranking and user experience. Google favors fast websites, which means a better position in search results and greater visibility for your business. Our websites load in less than 2 seconds, which is significantly faster than the industry average.

process.title: What does the website development process look like?

step1.title: Initial consultation and needs analysis
step1.text: We discuss your business goals, target audience, and features you need in detail. We analyze the competition and market to create a strategy that will set your website apart. This phase is crucial as it helps us understand your vision and create a website that will deliver results.

step2.title: Design and prototype
step2.text: We create a modern and functional design that reflects your brand identity. We make wireframes and prototypes so you can visualize how the website will look before we start development. We align all details with you and make necessary corrections until you are completely satisfied.

step3.title: Development and programming
step3.text: Our team of programmers uses the latest technologies (Next.js, React.js, Node.js) to build a fast, secure, and scalable website. During development, we carefully integrate all agreed features, optimize code for speed and SEO, and regularly update you on project progress.

step4.title: Testing and optimization
step4.text: Before launch, we thoroughly test the website on different devices and browsers. We check loading speed, functionality of all forms and links, SEO settings, and design responsiveness. We optimize images and code for maximum performance.

step5.title: Launch and training
step5.text: After your approval, we launch the website on the desired hosting and domain. We provide you with detailed training for content management (if the package includes CMS), set up analytics and performance tracking tools. We remain available for support even after launch.

step6.title: Maintenance and support
step6.text: We offer regular maintenance, security updates, and technical support. We monitor website performance and suggest improvements. We are here to help you with any questions or necessary changes.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about website development

q1.question: How long does the website development process take?
q1.answer: The development time depends on the chosen package and project complexity. We develop a basic website in 7-10 days, professional and premium packages usually take 10-14 days. For more complex projects with custom features, the deadline may be longer. During the initial consultation, we give you a precise timeframe for your project.

q2.question: Do I need to have technical knowledge to manage the website?
q2.answer: No, technical knowledge is not required. If you choose a package with a CMS system (Professional or Premium), you will get an intuitive content management system and detailed training. You will be able to change texts, images, and basic elements without the need for programming. For more complex changes, our team is always available to help.

q3.question: What is included in hosting?
q3.answer: The first year of hosting is included in the price of all our packages. Hosting includes SSD space, SSL certificate, regular backups, and technical support.

q4.question: Why is Next.js a better choice than WordPress?
q4.answer: Next.js offers superior performance with loading speeds up to 10 times greater than WordPress. Security is much better because there are no plugins that are a frequent target for hackers. SEO optimization is built into the code level, which guarantees better ranking. Also, you don't pay expensive premium plugins that are often necessary for WordPress. Our Next.js websites are easier to maintain and scale with your business growth.

q5.question: Can I migrate my existing WordPress site to Next.js?
q5.answer: Absolutely! We offer a specialized service for modernizing and migrating WordPress websites to the Next.js platform. We migrate all content, optimize images, improve SEO, and additionally speed up performance. Most clients notice a 50-80% improvement in Google ranking after migration, along with a dramatic increase in website speed.

q6.question: What if I need additional functionality not listed in the packages?
q6.answer: All our packages are customizable and we can add custom features according to your needs. This may include booking systems, integration with external APIs, custom forms, price calculators, memberships, galleries, blog systems, and much more. During the consultation, we will discuss your needs and provide an estimate for additional features.

q7.question: Is the website adapted for mobile phones?
q7.answer: Yes, all our websites are fully responsive and perfectly adapt to all devices - from mobile phones to desktop computers. More than 60% of users today use mobile devices to browse the internet, which is why mobile optimization is one of our priorities. The website will load quickly and be easy to use regardless of screen size.

q8.question: How does SEO optimization help my business?
q8.answer: SEO optimization is crucial for visibility on Google and other search engines. Quality SEO optimization brings organic free visits to your website from people actively searching for your products or services. This means more potential clients without paid advertising costs. Our websites have built-in SEO optimization that includes meta tags, structured data, speed optimization, mobile adaptability, and Core Web Vitals - all factors that Google uses for ranking.
